thread.title: Gamo Outdoor USA unveils new WASP Air Rifle
thread.title_full: Gamo Outdoor USA unveils new WASP Air Rifle - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Gamo Outdoor USA unveils new WASP Air Rifle
text:
The WASP is one of the most versatile air rifles from Gamo Outdoor USA and includes many of Gamo’s top features from their premium airguns, but at an affordable price.
Fort Lauderdale, FL (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
Gamo Outdoor USA ( http://www.gamooutdoorusa.com ) the leading manufacturer of high quality air guns, optics and laser designators is unveiling the new WASP Air rifle. The WASP is one of the most versatile air rifles from Gamo Outdoor USA and includes many of Gamo’s top features from their premium airguns, but at an affordable price.
It features components that are built completely in house by the European manufacturer, such as the fluted polymer jacketed steel barrel, new All-Weather black color stock, and recoil pad which increases accuracy. This rifle offers Gamo’s industry renowned build-to-last outstanding quality, dimensions and weight specially designed for air gun enthusiast shooters and varmint hunters.
Wasp SPECS
.177 Cal. Up to 1250 FPS with .177 PBA® Platinum pellets. Fluted polymer jacketed steel barrel. New All-Weather Stock. 4x 32 Scope. Recoil pad MSRP $189.95
For press inquiries, please email Fedor Palacios, Marketing Communications Manager (fpalacios(at)gamousa.com)
Gamo Outdoor USA is a leading consumer products company that designs, manufactures and markets a diverse portfolio of outdoor sporting goods products under such world class brands as GAMO®, BSA Optics®, Laser Genetics®, Aftermath®, and is the exclusive distributor of BSA Guns and Joker Knives®.
For more information visit:
http://www.gamousa.com
